summary: An alcoholic actress who is considered a dangerous jinx is rehabilitated, but she then shows that she's as dangerous as ever.
cast: Bette Davis|Franchot Tone|Margaret Lindsay|Alison Skipworth|John Eldredge|Dick Foran|Walter Walker|Richard Carle|George Irving|Pierre Watkin|Douglas Wood|William B. Davidson|George Beranger|Bill Elliott|Helen Ericson|Florence Fair|Eddie Foster|Pauline Garon|Edward Keane|Milton Kibbee|Alma Lloyd|Larry McGrath|Miki Morita|Frank O'Connor|Craig Reynolds|Sam Rice|Cyril Ring|Eddie Shubert|Libby Taylor|Mary Treen|Billy Wayne
title: Peligrosa
